products.detailed_description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max comes with a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, a powerful A17 Pro chip, a triple-camera setup with a periscope zoom lens, and USB-C connectivity. Built with aerospace-grade titanium, it is lighter and more durable than its predecessors.
